ezvcard.util
Class JCardValue

java.lang.Object
  ezvcard.util.JCardValue

public class JCardValue
extends Object

Represents the value of a jCard property.

addValues

public void addValues(Object... values)
Adds one or more values to the jCard value. List objects that are passed into this method will be treated as multi-valued components.

Parameters:
values - the value(s) to add
